properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 8:19AM EST until February 18 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected, gradually mixing with and changing to rain
by midday. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Jefferson county.

* WHEN...Until noon EST today.

* IMPACTS...Travel this morning will be difficult due to snow and
slush covered roads along with poor visibility. The hazardous
conditions will impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited
visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY
